name: SpaceFantasy~AnonymousHero~
description:
The thrilling shooting game is now available on Steam!

Manipulate the ""Hero who wishes to remain anonymous""
While mowing down the approaching mecha corps
Defeat the mech army in high-speed battles.

feature
・Similar to mobile, you can easily play in your free time with easy operation.
・ You can enjoy the sense of speed, very thrilling experience
・ You can play challenging stages as many times as you like without getting bored
